description: An unauthenticated Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability exists in a service accessed via the PAPI protocol provided by Aruba InstantOS and ArubaOS 10. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability results in the ability to interrupt the normal operation of the affected access point.

product.name: Aruba Access Points running InstantOS and ArubaOS 10
